task.title: Lock or Unlock Tiers
task.shortdesc: Lock or unlock tiers against editing.

step.cmd: To lock a tier, select the check box to the left of its name under the Locked column. To unlock a tier, de-select the check box.
step.stepresult: Selected tiers will be locked against editing in the Record Data view.To lock or unlock all tiers, use the Lock all tiers/Unlock all tiers button.
